title: Item Lore Stats如何设置怪物不会掉装备

replies.txt_content:
在config里面找到

npcDropEquippedGear:
  dropChance:
    helmet: 0
    chestplate: 0
    leggings: 0
    boots: 0
    itemInHand: 0

吧数值100修改为0就行了

replies.author: a1423541545
replies.txt_content:
992979148 发表于 2016-1-18 14:07
在config里面找到

npcDropEquippedGear:
咖啡大大怎么可以解决从背包切换出来会减少桃心呢{:10_512:}
